Question
========

The variance of a set of scores can be viewed as the average of the

Answerlist
----------

* Squared deviations
* Positive and negative deviations
* Roots of deviations

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Squared deviations: Correct
* Positive and negative deviations: Incorrect
* Roots of deviations: Incorrect
